meanings.definition: The practice of creating and distributing audio or video files over the internet for playback on mobile devices or computers.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy listening to podcasts on my phone during long trips.
meanings.sent2: Many people find podcasting a convenient way to stay informed.
meanings.sent3: My friend joked that he was so into podcasting, he could hear the internet.
meanings.sent4: The world of podcasting is like a vast library of voices waiting to be heard.
meanings.sent5: The popularity of podcasting continues to grow as more content creators join the trend.

meanings.definition: A series of digital media files released episodically and often downloaded through web syndication.
meanings.sent1: She subscribed to a podcasting series that releases new episodes every week.
meanings.sent2: Podcasting has become a common way for people to consume entertainment on the go.
meanings.sent3: The podcasting series she followed had her hooked with its cliffhangers.
meanings.sent4: In the world of podcasting, each episode is like a chapter in a digital book.
meanings.sent5: The addictive nature of podcasting keeps listeners coming back for more episodes.
